mapper.select: select id,name,url,sort,level,parent_id,vdef1,vdef2,vdef3 from menu where id=#{id} AND platform_id = #{platformId}
mapper.delete: delete from menu where id=#{id} AND platform_id = #{platformId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM menu WHERE level =1 AND id IN ( SELECT menu_id FROM role_menu WHERE role_id IN ( SELECT role_id FROM user_role WHERE user_id = #{userId} ) ) order by sort

select * from menu where 1=1
AND name like CONCAT("%",#{search.name},"%")
AND url like CONCAT("%",#{search.url},"%")
order by level,sort
select m.*,rm.role_id as roleId from menu m left join role_menu rm on m.id=rm.menu_id where rm.role_id=#{roleId} order by m.sort
